ConfigurationOption.Value: select wo.wonum, wo.description, wo.schedstart, wo.lbl_wcdcatg_finl, wo.lbl_wkthruid, wo.estdur, (select to_char( dbms_lob.substr(ldtext,3999) ) from longdescription where ldkey = wo.workorderid and ldownertable = 'WORKORDER' and ldownercol = 'DESCRIPTION') ldtext, wo.location, wo.status, wo.jpnum, wo.calcpriority, wo.worktype, wo.lead, wo.supervisor, wo.reportdate, wo.reportedby, wo.wo1, wo.workorderid, wo.siteid, wo.orgid, (select count(*) from lbl_labtrans ll where ll.refwo=wo.wonum and ll.lbl_status in ('ASSIGN','COMPLETE')) assign_status_count, wo.leadcraft, wo.LBL_CONDITION_REL, wo.lbl_workcntrhazard, wo.lbl_release_status, l.lbl_mapcoordinate, jp.lbl_frequency as jp_intended_frequency from workorder wo left outer join locations l on (wo.siteid = l.siteid and wo.location = l.location) left outer join jobplan jp on (wo.jpnum = jp.jpnum) where wo.orgid = 'LBNL' and wo.siteid = 'FAC' and wo.historyflag = 0 and wo.istask = 0 and wo.status not in ( 'WCOMP','COMP','CAN', 'CLOSE', 'HISTEDIT')

Struct._value: := join( ',', locallist("Work Management", "Work Order", " Select = '1' and 'Walk Through ID' is not null "), ' - ' , 'Printed copy of work order must be issued to assigned worker.')
:= localquery( "Work Management", "WorkOrderID", " Select == 1 and 'Walk Through ID' is not null ") is not null
:= localquery( "Work Management", "WorkOrderID", " Select == 1 ") is not null
